Building_Blocks_key2: Kisi bhi programming language mein *`variables`* ka use values store karne ke liye hota hai - taki aap baad mein use manipulate (usme changes) kar sake.
Building_Blocks_key3: Javascript mein `variables` kaise use hote hain?
Building_Blocks_key5: Variables ke baare mein aur jaanne ke liye
Building_Blocks_key8: `Variables` banane ke kuch niyam hote hain:
Building_Blocks_key9: `Variables` ka naam kisi letter se shuru hona chahiye.
Building_Blocks_key11: Hum Javascript mein `variables` ka naam hum
Building_Blocks_key15: `Variables` ka naam aapke program ke context mein meaningful hona chahiye taaki aapka program padhne wale log ye samajh jaayein ki wah `variable` kya kar raha hai
Building_Blocks_key17: Navgurukul ke sare students ka age alag alag `variables` mein store karo aur unka average javascript use karke nikalo.
